snippet: Two top Department of Veterans Affairs officials are stepping down, the beleaguered agency announced Wednesday as it continued reeling from complaints that thousands of veterans have endured long waits for appointments and poor medical care....

headline.print_headline: 2 Top Veterans Affairs Officials Leaving Jobs
headline.main: 2 Top Veterans Affairs Officials Leaving Jobs

lead_paragraph: Two top Department of Veterans Affairs officials are stepping down, the beleaguered agency announced Wednesday as it continued reeling from complaints that thousands of veterans have endured long waits for appointments and poor medical care.
